website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy balloons have a fun, appealing design.
pros: Sea foam, pink, purple, and confetti balloons ideal for unicorn-themed parties
Includes 2 rolls totaling about 32 feet of gold ribbon
cons: Confetti-filled balloons are heavy and won't stay floating for long

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. We didn’t use helium, just blew them up and put them on the floor for the kids to kick around. None of them popped the whole party and the confetti ones are so pretty! Pro tip- blow the confetti balloons up with a pump instead of your mouth so it doesn’t get the condensation from your breath inside. I rubbed them on my daughters head to get the confetti to stick to the sides haha
customer_reviews.author: Ceaira R

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the balloons! Used them as balloon garland on the dessert table for a unicorn themed first birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but only holds helium for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty but 3of the confetti balloons popped while trying to fill with helium. I may have overfilled one but two popped just as I started to fill. Also we rubbed the outside with a washcloth, our shirts and our hair trying to create static for the confetti to stick to the sides but it didn’t work. Maybe because it was a rainy day? Not sure. Also the helium only lasted a few hours, maybe 4 or 5. They were already starting to come down by the end of the party so definitely wait until just before your event to fill them
customer_reviews.author: Jori Mason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, the confetti filled balloons are very heavy if you don’t remove most of the confetti prior to inflating. We took all the balloons to our grocery store to have filled and they were perfect for our outdoor unicorn party.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and was loved at the party. Only negative is if one of the balloons with the confetti burst, it gets everywhere. But that's a part of selecting this type of decoration. I'd buy it again. The kids loved the balloons most of all
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Balloons
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our children's quarantine birthday parties. They held up well; they are still inflated after a month. The confetti balloons were fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy... confetti disaster
customer_reviews.text: All of the confetti balloons came with holes in the top of them.. it sent confetti everywhere. The other colors were pretty few popped/hsd holes but super bummed about the confetti ones
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: So happy to come across this company! The colors were just as depicted in the photo. I received my package on time and the quality was 100%. I will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlang Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: So many balloons!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this price! So many balloons y’all! This will take care of your entire party! We just took them down to the local party store and they put helium in them for us and made a few arrangements. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE PRETTY COLORS!
customer_reviews.text: The colors match the description of product sold. Keep in mind the disclosure that states if you use helium the confetti balloons only last 3-5 hours fully blown. It was still cute and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Good colors but half balloons would have holes or deflate immediately
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Short Life
customer_reviews.text: They are super pretty and big. BUT! They deflate within 1-2hrs no matter it’s regular air or helium.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Can't say enough good things! They were easy to fill with a tank I bought. They are beautiful. If you aren't sure about these get them. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Modesitt Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra string!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were beautiful! Only 1 balloon had a hole. The reason I didn’t give a perfect review is because the gold string it came with was no where near enough for all of the balloons. Also, I couldn’t get the confetti to stick on clear balloons. Wish i woulda read directions before packing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: The colored balloons were amazing. The glitter ones were super disappointing. They hardly stayed up. And the confetti just stayed at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: christoper McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these balloons. They were exactly as pictured, didnt have a single one pop during inflation or during the party even. Sturdy vibrant and beautiful balloons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small ballons confetti prevent floating
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were horrible they didnt blow big and pretty like picture. I had them blowed by a company and they cad to blow them small so they would not pop also the ones with confetti did not float at all even when we did let some of the confetti out this was super disappointing bc the was one of the biggest features to time my colors for the party together
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Corley

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They lasted long enough for a party :) but wouldn’t blow them up until then as they deflated quickly. Looked great tho. The color scheme was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: They kept popping during the party. The inflated nicely and shinny but after a few house they became dull looking .
customer_reviews.author: Yesi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was asking about these ballons! Would definitly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Vapelife X

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for my daughters 2nd birthday! easy to blow up and the kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Glitzy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were so awesome. The colors blend very well. They were just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Condon

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: They were very vibrant and beautiful but not high quality we took to the store to get filled and they only lasted about 3hrs then started to get smaller and droop
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Givens

customer_reviews.title: Glitter balloons do not float
customer_reviews.text: Balloons were beautiful, wish they had stayed up. We ended up hanging them upside down instead, which was okay, but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Joann C

customer_reviews.title: blows up soon after inflated
customer_reviews.text: Bad rubber quality, as it blows up soon after inflated
customer_reviews.author: fantamas

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set of balloons. A few of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set of balloons. A few of the clear balloons wouldn't float. I guess the items inside were just a bit too heavy. You'll need more ribbon as what was included wasn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to inflate. Held the helium the whole 4 hour party until we deflated them. The confetti balloons were amazing as well. Definitely would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Santianna

customer_reviews.title: Elsa Theme Birthday Party
customer_reviews.text: My 4 YO wanted an Elsa theme birthday party so i ordered these balloons and they went perfect with all the the rest of the decor. They were very easy to inflate and and did last pretty long. Good quality balloons
customer_reviews.author: Syed F Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Nice ballons
customer_reviews.text: Very vibrant and fun balloons! My daughter loved the confetti!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality! They didn't burst at all and looked beautiful for days.
customer_reviews.author: Shemeka Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The balloons with confetti do not hold Up well at all. We paid extra because of helium shortage and more than half of the confetti balloons were deflated within 5 hours of being filled...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Balloons do not hold helium.
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were so pretty and my daughter loved them but they lasted all of an hour and then they were laying on the ground. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: A lot of balloons, good value.
customer_reviews.text: The confetti balloons were really cute but the confetti didn’t stay up it sort of ponded on the bonded. Still really liked this as it was a great value and perfect for what we used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Palaualelo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Balloons were good quality! The confetti balloons worked great, and the colors all matched the party perfectly! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I likes that everything got here on time and accurate to description! my daighyer loved it
customer_reviews.author: Magali Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Ok balloon
customer_reviews.text: The picture is definitely misleading. The balloon is latex with some round cuts in there. And a few balloons had holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and my daughter loved popping the confetti filled ones afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vigar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decoration for kid’s parties or baby showers!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loved the balloons! We used them to celebrate her 4th birthday party. I Definitely will buy them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Grecia

customer_reviews.title: I’m love balloons now
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is the balloons were very gorgeous and add a nice flare to my daughter’s birthday party 🥳
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters party was amazing with these balloons! Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love everything they were easy to inflate my daughter love them
customer_reviews.author: Anahisa

customer_reviews.title: No hope for float!
customer_reviews.text: These ballons were filled with helium and lasted for less than 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Alittle pricey for what you bought. But they were beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved them! Our party was unicorn themed and they were perfect. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chanda green

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them they made the room look so much nicer!! We popped them and the confetti went everywhere . The kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I was unable to get confetti to stick to balloon
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to get the confetti in the balloons to stick to the sides
customer_reviews.author: delia solis

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with everything I needed in the pack. I didn't have to run out and find string.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality balloons, lasted several days. The colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set of balloons. Just what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Toya snell

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: It was a conversation piece at my daughters baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were easy to blow up and it turned out so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Jamilla

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful surprise
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as described! Worked well to surprise my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Clark

customer_reviews.title: a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! they EVEN COME WITH UNICORN STICKERS! MY daughter LOVED THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyell M.

customer_reviews.title: Party
customer_reviews.text: Use them for my daughter's first birthday party and they were awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gardner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Balloons wouldn’t stay up.
customer_reviews.text: The confetti balloons would not stay up when I put helium in them.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors but not quite as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty balloons, but confetti didn’t cling to the sides. Served no decorative purpose. Bought a different brand in the past and the confetti clinged to the sides naturally and everyone commented and asked where I got such cool balloons. Not the case this time.
customer_reviews.author: UsrX

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for Mermaid themed party
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in love with these balloons. The solid balloons are great colors for a mermaid party. The clear balloons were everyone's favorite at the party. You blow them up and rub them to get the confetti stuff on the inside to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the confetti balloons!! But be careful my three-year-old grab one before it was inflated and confetti went everywhere. But they are amazing!! You made my quarantine birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Smith

customer_reviews.title: Party Time
customer_reviews.text: Colors are beautiful. Held helium long time. Confetti everywhere when kids popped them and they had a good time’
customer_reviews.author: kelli white

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful balloons
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my daughter’s unicorn birthday. The colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Electronic ShinobiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Used balloons throughout my unicorn themed baby shower. They were easy to use, stayed inflated and the confetti ones worked perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: EJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These looked so pretty with my color theme made it stand out more! Colors are as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Alyzza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the birthday party of my daughter looked great with this balloons
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were absolutely beautiful. The confetti looks gorgeous inside the balloon once we added ai.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. The design is so cute, which is why i bought them. I like that its a bundle, makes it worth paying. Super cute for birthday or baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Uhhmerika

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for my unicorn themed baby shower, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annece Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: A lot of balloons just kept popping for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you fill the balloon with confetti as much as possible otherwise it won’t float up.
customer_reviews.author: Yarida Wong

customer_reviews.title: Amazing balloons and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing balloons and great customer service. They even send an email with best tips. I didn't have time to rub the balloon for the confetti to stick, they look awesome anyways. The kids enjoyed popping them to get the confetti out. Will def order again!
customer_reviews.author: cora

product_meta.title: Unicorn Balloons 40 Pack, 12 Inch Light Purple Pink Seafoam Blue Latex Balloons with Confetti Balloon for Party Supplies Graduation Wedding Baby Shower Unicorn Birthday Decorations with Ribbon
feature_bullets: UNIQUE IDEA- Our Confetti Balloons be filled with White Purple Light Pink Sea Foam Blue Gold 5 colors Confetti, 3 colors latex balloons set, would give you a unique Unicorn Theme party.

EXCELLENT MATERIAL- Natural latex balloons, thick and strong, support air and helium. But the latex balloons only can float 3-4h, especially the confetti balloons with confetti weight, the float time is more short(about 1h), so strongly recommend fill them with air. Or you can take away some confetti and add Hi-Float inside to float longer.

USED IN VARIETY WAYS- This Unicorn Balloons kit suit for wide scene, Birthday Party, baby shower, Bridal shower, Wedding...They are perfect for balloons bouquet, floral arrangements, home and table decor, photo shoot, party games etc

ADD MUCH FUN- For confetti balloons, after inflated, please rub gently with towel, wool, carpet, cloth and roll the balloons to get static so that the confetti stick to the wall the balloon. Pop the balloons will make a great fun when confetti flying out in party.

FULL AFTER-SALES SATISFACTION- Any quality problem or suggestion, welcome click "seller contact" button in your Amazon account to email us, we will solve it for you once get your message until you are satisfied.
